title: Lol support.
body: I am unable to log into the lol support page. Any reason why? Can someone give me a link to the sign in page maybe? Thanks.

replies.body: If the sign in page keeps redirecting you to the logged out page, try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) really quickly or signing in while in an incognito/private window.
Still, can't. This is the page I get https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/signin?return_to=https%3A%2F%2Fsupport.riotgames.com%2Fhc%2Fen-us&locale=1

Straaaaange. Was there a specific article you were trying to get to or were you trying to send us a ticket? If you're trying to send a ticket, do me a favor and try using this link -> [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
Ticket. I used the login button on the ticket and it just redirects me there. And in the main screen login.

I know awhile back some players were having issues with this and a VPN like CyberGhost to see if that can let you in. If that still doesn't work, you should be able to email a ticket to us at support@riotgames.com.
I even tried using different things like my phone and tablet. Still, doesn't work.
Ahoj Riote mohly byste prosím vás odstranit LeaveBuster, protože mi příjde nefér, když mi spadne Internet

I need help with the new Email
pls help
